channel.title: python on Amuro Peng
channel.description: Recent content in python on Amuro Peng

item.title: deque
item.description: python的双端队列库：deque d = collections.deque([]) d.append(‘a’) # 在最右边添加一个元素，此时 d=deque(‘a’) d.appendleft(‘b’) # 在最左边添加一个元素，此时 d=deque([‘b’, ‘a’]) d.extend([‘c’,‘d’]) # 在最右边添加所有元素，此时 d=deque([‘b’,

item.title: Heapq

item.title: Common Usages
item.description: Difference between ‘Null’ and ‘None’ There is no Null in Python, which means blank string str('') Difference between ‘is’ and ‘==’ == describes same value ‘is’ represents same object, including same addresses, same value, same everything.

item.title: env&requirements 虚拟环境与依赖文件
item.description: 虚拟环境Virtualenv 安装 pip install virtualenv // pip install virtualenvwrapper 检测是否安装好 virtualenv --version // 16.7.5 创建虚拟环境 virtualenv --no-site-packages venv_yourname // --no-site-packeages参数:不使用系
